verses.content: Amazia chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmhni pakuo ro a rêl a, a nu hming chu Jehoaddan, Jerusalem mi a nih.
LALPA mithmuah thil indik chu a thawh a; amiruokchu, lungril ṭha famkim leh ni loin.
Lalram chu ama ta dinga sukdet a ni phing chun, a pa lal thattu a siehlawhai kha a that tâwl a.

Nisienlakhawm, an nauhai chu a that nawh a, LALPA thupêk ang a, Mosie lekhabua dâna ziek angin a thaw lem tah a; “Nauhai ta dingin pahai chu thi naw ni hai a, nauhai chu pahai ta dingin thi bawk naw ni hai; amiruokchu, mi tin mâni suolna senga ding chun thi lem an tih,” tiin.

Chunawa khawm Amazia chun Juda mihai chu a ko khâwm a, Juda le Benjamin chia mi po pohai chu za pâwl hotu hnuoia dâm, sâng pâwl hotu hnuoia dâm an pahnam ang peiin an inumtir a; kum sâwmhni le a chungtienga mi po chu a tiem a, phâw le fei hmang thei, indo dinga fe suok thei ṭhieu le thlangsuok ṭhieu mi nuoi thum an um a.
Chun, tangka talent za khatin Israel rama inthawkin mi huoisen nuoi khat a ruoi bawk a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi a kuomah a hung a, “Aw lalpa, Israel sipaihai hi nanga ruolin fe ve naw raw hai se, Israelhai kuoma chun LALPA chu a um si nawh a; anih, Ephraim thlahai po po huomin.

Nisienlakhawm, in fe suok a ni hrim hrim chun, huoitakin thaw la, indonaa chun va hrât rawh, hmêl- mahai hmaa chun Pathien chun suktlâwm a ti che; Pathien chun ṭhangpui ding le pei thla dingin thilthawtheina a nei sih a,” a ta.

Amazia chun Pathien mi kuoma chun, “Anleh, Israel sipaihai kuoma tangka talent za ka lo pêk ta chu ieng tin am thâwng ei ti leh?” a ta. Pathien mi chun, “Hi nêka tam khawm hi pe ding chein LALPA chu a thei a nih,” tiin a dawn a.

Amazia chun, Ephraima in- thawka a kuoma sipai hunghai kha an in tienga fe nâwk el dingin a ṭhe thlâk tah a; chuongchun, Judahai chunga chun an lungsen chu nasa- takin a chawk tah a, lunginsen ṭium- tak chun in an inlawi nâwk tah a.
Chun, Amazia chu ân sukhuoi a, a mihai chu a ṭhuoi suok a, Chi Ruoma chun a fe tah a; Seir thlahai sîng khat rau chu a hang hne tah a.

Chun, mi dang sîng khat bawk chu Juda thlahai chun a hringin an ṭhuoi a, lungpui sîpa chun an hung ṭhuoi a, chuongchun, lungpui sîpa inthawk chun an pei thlâk a, an rêng chun an inphit vawng tâwl tah a.

Chun, sipai pâwla mihai chu, indo dinga ama le fe lo dinga Amazia chun a tirkirhai khan Samaria inthawk Beth-horon chenin Juda ram khawpuihai chu an hang rûn a, mi sâng thum an that a, râllâk sum tamtak an lâk bawk a.
Chun, Amazia chu Edom mihai that a hung kîr hnung chun, Seir thlahai pathien chu a hung lâk a, a pathienhai ni dingin a sieh a, an hmaa chun a kûn a, an kuoma chun riminhnikhai a raw tah a.

Chuleichun, LALPA lunginsen chu Amazia chunga chun a hung ṭal tah a, a kuoma chun zâwlnei a tir a, a kuomah, “I kuta inthawka an mihai ngei khawm sanhim thei si lo, mipuihai pathienhai chu iengdinga i zawng am a na?” a tih a.

Chun, ama le an inbiek zing lai chun lal chun a kuomah, “Lal thurawnpuituah kan siem che am a nih? Fîmkhur rawh; iengdingin am thatin um i ta?” a ta. Chuongchun, zâwlnei chun, “Ka thurâwn chu i pawisa nawh a, hi thil hi i thaw leiin, Pathien chun suksiet a tum che a nih ti ka hriet a nih,” a ta, a to tah a.
Chun, Juda ram lal Amazia chun thurawn a lâk a, Israel lal Jehu naupa Jehoahaz naupa Joas kuomah mi a tir a, “Hung ta, hmai le hmaisan ngeiah hang inen ei tih,” tiin.

Chun, Israel ram lal Joas chun Juda ram lal Amazia kuoma chun mi a tir a, “Lebanona hlingbukin Leba- nona Sidar thing kâwlah mi tirin, ‘I naunu kha ka naupa nuhmei dingin pe rawh,’ tiin; chun, Lebanona ram- sahai chu an hung a, hlingbuk chu an chîl thlûk tah a.

A ni luo, ‘Edom chu ka hang hneh a’ i ta, i lungrilin uong dingin a dawm sâng che a ni hi; i inah um ṭawk ṭawk el rawh, i sietna ding chu chawksuok ṭâl dîm nîng a ti; nang tlûng i ta, nang ngei chu, chun nang le chun Juda ram chu tlu bawk a tih,” a ta.
Amiruokchu, Amazia chun a ngai chuong nawh a, an hmêlmahai kuta a pêk theina dinga Pathien ithaw a nih, Edom pathienhai an lo zawng ta lei khan.
Chuongchun, Israel ram lal Joas chu a hang feh a; Juda rama Beth-semesa chun ama le Juda ram lal Amazia chu hmaisan ngeia chun an inen tah a.
Israel hmaa chun Juda chan chu a se nâwkzuol tah a; mi tin chu mâni puon ina seng an tlânse tah a.

Chun, Israel ram lal Joas chun Jehoahaz naupa Joas naupa Juda ram lal Amazia chu Beth-semesa chun a man a, Jerusalema chun a hung ṭhuoi a, Ephraim tienga dâi kawtkhâra inthawka a kia dâi kawtkhâr chen, tawng za li zet Jerusalem kul chu a vuok chim a.
Chun, Obed-edom le Pathien ina rângkachak le tangkaruo le bûr le bêlhai po po, lal ina ro thilhluhai le, hrên ding salhai le chun a lâk a, Samaria chun a kîr tah a.
Chun, Israel lal Jehoahaz nau- pa Joas thi hnung chun Juda lal Joas naupa Amazia chu kum sâwmpanga a la dam a.
Chun, Amazia thilthaw dang- hai, a hmasa le nuhnunghai khawm chu, ngai ta, Israel le Juda lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a ni naw am a nih?

Chun, Amazia chu LALPA zuinaa inthawka ân herhmang china khan chu Jerusalema chun ama chunga phierrûkna an siem a, Lakis tieng chen a tlânseh a, amiruokchu, Lakis tieng chun mi an tir pei a, chutaka chun an that tah a.
Chun, a ruong chu sakawr chungah an hung lâk a, a thlatuhai laiah David khawpuia chun an phûm tah a.
